speaker: IGUANA
text: You see, all the animals will eventually pass by,

speaker: IGUANA
text: And all you have to do is relax and say 'Hi'.

speaker: IGUANA
text: Then a conversation will naturally start,

speaker: IGUANA
text: Just don't be phony, speak from the heart.

speaker: DRAGON
text: So all that day, Lana stayed with Pepe,

speaker: DRAGON
text: And met animals who passed by their way.

speaker: DRAGON
text: First up was Kate, she was a beautiful gorilla,

speaker: DRAGON
text: She had the coloring of frosty vanilla.
